alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 8:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Bay County through 945 PM EDT/845 PM CDT/... At 858 PM EDT/758 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Panama City Beach, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, St Andrews State Park, Southport, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Beacon Beach, College Station, West Panama City, Camp Flowers, Bahama Beach, Gainer Spring, Biltmore Beach, Bennett and Brannonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
